main event: A bright yellow and luminous object was observed passing through clouds in Levelland, Texas on August 18, 1955.
interesting points: The object illuminated a cloud as it passed through,The observation lasted between 10 to 15 seconds,Only one object was reported,The object was observed at an altitude of 10,000 feet,There were comments suggesting the object could possibly be a balloon released from Reese AFB.
sighted object: one round, bright yellow and luminous object
